description: Packing smart is an art. Carrying the right essentials ensures you are prepared for your journey without being weighed down by unnecessary luggage.
sentences: Roll your clothes instead of folding them to save space and prevent wrinkles.
Always carry a basic first-aid kit with essential medicines.
A portable power bank is a lifesaver for keeping your devices charged.
Segregate your luggage using packing cubes for better organization.
dos: Carry copies of your important documents (passport, visa, ID).
Pack a universal travel adapter for international trips.
Carry any prescription medication in your hand luggage.
Pack clothing appropriate for the destination's weather and cultural norms.
donts: Don't pack valuables in your check-in luggage.
Don't carry full-size toiletries; use travel-size containers.
Avoid overpacking; you can often buy things at your destination.
Don't forget to leave some space for souvenirs.
